name: B&B Villa Roumanille
description: Located just 1 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Villa Roumanille is a typical Provençal house, which offers a garden and terrace. Cassis and its cliffs are a 30-minute drive away.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description: Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

name: Hôtel des Augustins
description: Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

name: Hôtel Le Mozart
description: Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

name: Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau
description: This Séjours & Affaires residence is located in Aix-en-Provence near the Cours Mirabeau. It offers furnished studios and free Wi-Fi internet access.

name: Au cœur des Papes, dans bâtisse de charme studios & appartements en cœur de ville
description: Au cœur des Papes, dans bâtisse de charme studios & appartements en cœur de ville provides accommodation within 200 metres of the centre of Avignon, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a...

name: Les petits poissons
description: Offering a garden and garden view, Les petits poissons is situated in Avignon, 2.1 km from Avignon Central Station and 3.4 km from Papal Palace.

name: T2 Charme, intramuros, quartier des Teinturiers
description: Situated in the centre of Avignon, just less than 1 km from Avignon Central Station and a 16-minute walk from Papal Palace, T2 Charme, intramuros, quartier des Teinturiers features accommodation with...

name: Loft vue Palais des Papes
description: In the Avignon City Centre district of Avignon, close to Avignon Central Station, Loft vue Palais des Papes has a garden and a washing machine.

name: Les Cachettes
description: Located 300 metres from Papal Palace, Les Cachettes features free WiFi. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description: Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena. Free WiFi is provided.

name: Hotel Majestic
description: Renovated in 2019, Hotel Majestic is located in Nîmes, just 320 metres from the Arenas of Nîmes and the town centre.

name: Odalys City Nîmes Arènes
description: Set in Nîmes in the Languedoc-Roussillon region with Arenes de Nimes and Esplanade Charles-de-Gaulle nearby, Odalys City Nîmes Arènes provides accommodation with access to a hammam.

name: Royal Hôtel
description: Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square.
